name: Amendola - Connecticut - Robusto
additionalNotes: Manufactured at the La Zona factory in Esteli, Nicaragua and one of the two long awaited new additions to the Cannoli line comes the White Cannoli (Ecuadorian Shade Grown Connecticut). Tasting Notes: White Pepper, Buttercream, Coffee, Nuts, Cedar, Sweet Tobacco to medium in body and strength, this isn’t your average boring CT. So grab an espresso, light one up and prepare for the flavor explosion.
